Furious: When this model makes a charge during its activation, it may do so without spending influence.)

• Enemy models within this pulse suffer 3 DMG.

Character Traits.name: Grim Caress
Character Traits.text: When an enemy model ends an activation engaging this model, the enemy model suffers 3 DMG.

Character Traits.name: Killer
Character Traits.text: This model gains +1 DMG to playbook damage results while attacking models of the named type.

Character Traits.name: Good Feet, for a Big Man
Character Traits.text: This model may make passes without spending influence. Friendly models may make passes to this model without spending influence.

Character Traits.name: Plague Ridden
Character Traits.text: While suffering the disease condition, this model gains +1 DMG to playbook damage results.

Character Traits.name: Protect the Ball
Character Traits.text:
Once per turn during this model’s activation, it may choose a friendly harvest marker within 2" and remove it from the pitch. If it does, friendly models within the pulse gain Close Control for the remainder of the turn.
(Close Control: This model may ignore the first tackle playbook result that it suffers each turn.)

Character Traits.name: Sheep Become the Shepherds
Character Traits.text: If this model suffers the taken out condition during the Activation Phase, friendly models are allocated influence up to their max INF.

Character Traits.name: Heartless Brute!
Character Traits.text:
When an enemy model inflicts the taken out condition on this model, the enemy model suffers Singled Out for the remainder of the turn.
(Singled Out: Friendly models gain +2 TAC while attacking target enemy model.)

Character Traits.name: Herding
Character Traits.text: Once per turn during this model’s activation, it may choose a friendly harvest marker within 2" and remove it from the pitch. If it does, choose an enemy model within 3". The chosen enemy model suffers a 3" push.

Character Traits.name: Littermates
Character Traits.text:
If this model suffers the taken out condition the named friendly model gains Furious and +4 TAC for the remainder of the turn.
(Furious: When this model makes a charge during its activation, it may do so without spending influence.)

Character Traits.name: Matched Pair
Character Traits.text: This model and the named friendly model are treated as a single Squaddie during team selection. While the named friendly model is on the pitch, this model activates simultaneously with it. When this model suffers the taken out condition, the enemy team gains 1 VP instead of 2 VP.

Character Traits.name: Workhorse
Character Traits.text: If this model suffers the taken out condition it may place up to 5 friendly harvest markers anywhere on the pitch.

Character Traits.name: Baa-ttering Ram
Character Traits.text: During this model’s advances, models whose bases are touched by its base immediately suffer a 4" push directly away from it. This model can only push each model once per turn with Baa-ttering Ram.

Character Traits.name: Flock
Character Traits.text: When this model ends an advance, one other friendly model within this pulse may make a 2" dodge.

Character Traits.name: Have You Any Wool?
Character Traits.text: If this model suffers the taken out condition friendly models gain +2 ARM for the remainder of the turn.

Character Traits.name: All About The Game
Character Traits.text: If this model suffers the taken out condition friendly models gain +1/+1" KICK for the remainder of the turn.

Character Traits.name: Shearing
Character Traits.text: Once per turn during this model’s activation, it may choose a friendly harvest marker within 2" and remove it from the pitch. If it does, this model may make a 4" dodge.

Character Traits.name: Do the Thing!
Character Traits.text: Once per turn a friendly model may take a second activation.

Character Traits.name: Lance
Character Traits.text: When this model makes a charge, this model gains an additional +2 TAC and +1 DMG to playbook damage results for the duration of the charge.

Character Traits.name: Shelling Out
Character Traits.text: Friendly models within this aura gain +1 TAC. When a friendly model within this aura inflicts the taken out condition on an enemy model, the friendly team gains an additional 1 MP.

Character Traits.name: Trusty Steed
Character Traits.text: This model fills the roles of both Captain and Mascot in your team. This model generates 2 VPs when it suffers the taken out condition. Avarisse may not be selected for your team if this model is your captain.

Character Traits.name: Contract
Character Traits.text: While the named friendly model is on the pitch, this model activates simultaneously with it.

Character Traits.name: Drop Off
Character Traits.text: Once per turn during this model’s activation, if the named friendly model isn't on the pitch and isn't suffering the taken out condition, it may be placed on the pitch in base contact with this model.

Character Traits.name: Thuggery
Character Traits.text: While this model is within 1" of the named friendly model, this model gains +1 DMG to playbook damage results and may add a KD playbook result to each successful attack it makes.

Character Traits.name: Pick Up
Character Traits.text: Once per turn during this model's activation, if this model isn't in possession of the ball and is in base contact with the friendly Avarisse, this model may remove all conditions it's suffering and remove itself from the pitch.

Character Traits.name: Ready to Go
Character Traits.text: This model may be allocated influence while not on the pitch.

Character Traits.name: With Aplomb
Character Traits.text: When this model scores a goal with a snap shot, the friendly team gains +1 VP.

Character Traits.name: Back to Black
Character Traits.text: Once per turn, during this model's activation, it may remove the burning condition from a friendly model within 6". If it does so, that model may immediately make a 4" dodge.

Character Traits.name: Blinded by the Light
Character Traits.text: While this model is suffering the burning condition, enemy models suffer -1 TAC while attacking this model.

Character Traits.name: Flare Out
Character Traits.text:
While this model is on the pitch, friendly models which are suffering the burning condition gain Overheat.
(Overheat [3" Pulse]: When this model suffers the taken out condition during the Activation Phase, enemy models within this pulse suffer 3 DMG and the burning condition.)

Character Traits.name: The Ladderman Cometh
Character Traits.text:
If this model is not suffering from the burning condition, it gains Extended Reach.
(Extended Reach: During its activation this model's melee zone is 3".)

Character Traits.name: Light Goes On
Character Traits.text:
While this model is suffering from the burning condition, it gains +2 TAC and Searing Strike.
(Searing Strike: Enemy models damaged by this model suffer -1 ARM for the remainder of the turn and the burning condition.)

Character Traits.name: Light Goes Off
Character Traits.text: At the end of this model's activation, it may remove the burning condition from itself and then immediately make a 4" dodge.

Character Traits.name: Ring of Fire
Character Traits.text: When this model scores a goal, if it does not use Run the Length, models within this pulse suffer the burning condition.

Character Traits.name: Spotlight
Character Traits.text: If this model is suffering the burning condition, it gains +1/+2 KICK and ignores engaging and intervening penalties when making a kick.

Character Traits.name: Afterglow
Character Traits.text: When this model is suffering the burning condition, when a friendly model within this aura spends MP, that model may recover 2 HP. Each model may recover HP from Afterglow only once per turn.

Character Traits.name: Now You See Me...
Character Traits.text:
While not suffering the burning condition, this model gains Unpredictable Movement.
(◉ Unpredictable Movement: Once per turn when an enemy model ends an advance in this model's melee zone, this model may immediately make a 2" Dodge.)

Character Traits.name: Clumsy
Character Traits.text: Enemy models entering or starting their activations within this aura suffer the burning and poison conditions.

Character Traits.name: Flash Point
Character Traits.text: Once per turn, during this model's activation, you may remove the Burning condition from this model. If you do, enemy models within this pulse suffering the burning condition suffer -1 TAC and -1"/-1" MOV for the rest of the turn.

Character Traits.name: Natural Baller
Character Traits.text: Once per turn, when this model gains possesion of a ball marker, this model may immediately be allocated 1 influence.

Character Traits.name: Dread Captain
Character Traits.text: Once per turn, when this model makes an Attack you may reroll up to 2 dice.

Character Traits.name: Scummy Snack
Character Traits.text: When a friendly named model activates within 4" of this model, the friendly named model may be allocated 1 influence.

Character Traits.name: Who's a Good Boy
Character Traits.text: Once per turn, when targeting a friendly named model with a character play, this model may use the character play without spending influence.

Character Traits.name: Bait And Switch
Character Traits.text: When this model scores a goal, if it does not use Run the Length, enemy models within this pulse suffer either the snared or bleed condition.
